extendedInfo.description: The  easiest  Playlist Manager around !!! It has features you will not find with other apps.A Playlist Manager with a difference !!!! Â Integrates with PowerampUser feedback has resulted in some interesting functionality. For instance:New in this version the availability of Poweramp mp3 tags !!! If you have Poweramp installed, this app will offer tags such as "rating", "Last Played" and "Times Played" so you can create playlists from these too. To make android playlists available in Poweramp, follow the instructions in the User Guide.Note: Popular music players such as Poweramp  use their own databases to store mp3 metadata which is not available to other android players.Also new is the possibility to create playlists from whole music folders or create playlists based on Genre, Year, Artist, Composer or Decade.The playlists can then be played in the android music player or other playersIt allows you to easily manage your native android playlists. It is totally music player independent.The main screen lets you create  playlists with random selections, either albums or tracks.A single click on the selected playlist will add a randomly selected complete album or track from your collection.It also allows you to create your own playlists of course !!.For those wanting to use their playlists on other devices or with other android music players such as Poweramp or Winamp, this app allows export of m3u playlists both in Unix or Windows Format.Main Features :+ create your own native android playlists+ generate random playlists automatically (users can set the limits)+ Create Playlists using your preferred playlist name+ Create Playlists of your music folders, Artist, Genre, Year, Composer or Decade  with one click+ integration with Poweramp tags such as "rating" , "Last Played", "Number of times played"+ Delete  Playlists+ remove selected tracks from any playlist+ export m3u playlists (Unix or Windows format)+ Fully parameterized preferences+ on-going development and enhancements  I am open to further suggestions.This is the version for which development work will continue.

reviews.title: What a fantastic app!
reviews.comment: *UPDATE* This app is wonderful.  I inquired about an option for creating playlists from song ratings and the developer responded in hours and had the update with this function in days.  There is nothing like it on the market and it is EASILY the best $1.05 I\'ve ever spent on an app.  *(earlier review)The creator is very open to suggestions for improvement.

reviews.title: Excellent playlist manager
reviews.comment: This is one of the best playlist managers on the market. It has special features such adding a random album. Other nice features are the m3u playlist export. Now I can use these on my  pc or use Poweramp!!!. It has a comprehensive user guide too. Something you not often find with apps. Really easy!!! Nice new folder feature in v1.11
